gen:link.label:label: BV644_2: The total volume for the line of business reported in SR.26.05 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-Life underwriting risk should be equal to the addition of its premiums volume and its reserves volume taking into consideration the geographical diversification factor. -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.26.05; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0910,c0010}=Reported and {SR.26.05, r0010,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x34] then {SR.26.05, r0190,c0090}=({SR.26.05, r0190,c0060}+{SR.26.05, r0190,c0070})*(0.75+0.25*{SR.26.05, r0190,c0080})

BV644_2: The total volume for the line of business reported in SR.26.05 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-Life underwriting risk should be equal to the addition of its premiums volume and its reserves volume taking into consideration the geographical diversification factor. -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.26.05; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0910,c0010}=Reported and {SR.26.05, r0010,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x34] then {SR.26.05, r0190,c0090}=({SR.26.05, r0190,c0060}+{SR.26.05, r0190,c0070})*(0.75+0.25*{SR.26.05, r0190,c0080})
